description: Shopee Open Platform documentation for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

sections.name: What is Shopee Open Platform?
sections.description: Created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs, Shopee Open Platform is your go-to source of Open APIs and services

sections.name: Benefits of using Shopee Open API?
sections.description: Shopee Open API provides sellers with quick and easy access to important shop data for selling on Shopee. This includes information for product, order, and campaign management, amongst others.

sections.name: Who can access Shopee Open Platform?
sections.description: Shopee Open Platform caters to 2 types of developers: software service providers and sellers with software development capabilities

features: Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing

notes: This appears to be the introduction/overview page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation. It contains no specific API endpoint information, but rather general platform information, benefits, and access details. The page shows a navigation menu on the left with various API documentation sections that could be explored further.
